trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> class represents a configuration element for a service name used in a <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 類別，代表在 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection" /> 中使用之服務名稱的組態項目。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property is set to `null`.
trans-unit.target: 當這個建構函式用來初始化的新執行個體<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement>類別<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A>屬性設定為`null`。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property should be set to an appropriate value for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> instance to the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A>屬性應該設定為適當的值，然後再呼叫應用程式<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A>方法，將<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement>執行個體<xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定這個 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 執行個體的服務提供者名稱 (Service Provider Name，SPN)。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that contains the representation of SPN for this <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.String" />，包含此 <see cref="T:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement" /> 執行個體的服務提供者名稱表示。
